description:
Don't be fooled by Chrome... She LOVES the sun too! Grab the Chrome Swimsuit Outfit and defeat any 2D enemy that steps in her way!

Note: Players can access the Chrome Swimsuit Outfit by going to the Menu and scrolling to the Equipment section. The Chrome Swimsuit Outfit is purely cosmetic and is visible during battle, cut scenes, and exploration segments with Neptune. Mix-n-match with the animal sets for fun!
name: Chrome Swimsuit Outfit
